scripts.start: turbo run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production LOG_LEVEL=error pnpm -C ./apps/arb-solana-bot start
scripts.start:debug: turbo run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=true LOG_LEVEL=debug pnpm -C ./apps/arb-solana-bot start
scripts.wizard: turbo run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm -C ./apps/arb-solana-bot wizard
scripts.trade: turbo run build && cd apps/arb-solana-bot && yarn start
scripts.clean: git clean -xdf node_modules && pnpm recursive exec -- git clean -xdf node_modules dist
scripts.publish-packages: turbo run lint build && changeset version && changeset publish
